name: Moments (Arbit)
description:
Sol's the kid who sits in the back row and never talks. The type who's not very good at school but not very good at anything else either. Quiet, passive, without anything to say because he's afraid of saying the wrong thing.

Then he catches Chet stealing test answers.

Or: the boy meets boy story between a repressed rich kid and a cheating soccer player.

Features

  • 7900 words. Short and sweet, like the last days of summer
  • Sprites, CGs, and a custom UI

Credits

  • Music from patrickdearteaga.com and Partners In Rhyme
  • Background images edited from Wikimedia Commons, Pixabay, Pxfuel, and Flickr
